varotra.description: Revolutionary complete automation solution for grocery stores and supermarkets. Varotra Intelliz transforms the shopping experience by combining intelligent robotics and computer vision. The system integrates an AI-guided robotic arm that automatically detects and picks up ordered items, placing them on a smart conveyor system. Customers order via a multi-platform web interface (phone, computer, tablet) or even by phone via Asterisk for areas without Internet. The system also includes an automated payment module using a retrained YOLO model to recognize Malagasy Ariary banknotes and automatically give change. L2 year-end project carried out in collaboration, my main role was training AI models and designing/assembling the robotic arm.

manidina.description: Ambitious project born from a database management educational exercise, Manidina Aviation is became a complete system for aggregating and exploiting global airport data. The project gathers comprehensive databases on 89,000+ airports, their runways, ATC frequencies, navaids, aerial routes, and airlines. After an intensive phase of data cleaning and optimization with Python/Pandas, the system offers advanced features of map visualization, multi-criteria search, statistical analysis, and optimal route calculation inspired by Dijkstra's algorithm. The technical architecture combines React for the interface, Javalin (Java) for the backend API, and PostgreSQL for storage. Personal project in continuous development, the roadmap includes AI integration for personalized recommendations and real-time weather data, with the goal of automating manual tasks for pilots and air traffic controllers.

gigapayant.description: Innovative solution for fair bandwidth distribution in a local network (LAN), GigaPayant transforms Internet distribution into a usage-based billing system similar to mobile operators. The system allows billing per MB or GB consumed via a secure 14-character access code system. Developed in collaboration with a networking team, this project lays the foundation for a potentially scalable local Internet service provider business. The Laravel architecture offers an intuitive user interface and a complete administration panel for prepaid code management, consumption monitoring, and usage statistics. My main contribution focused on developing the administrator interface, the user interface, and the 14-character code generation/validation system with anti-fraud algorithm.

scraping.description: Educational project exploring the power of low-code automation combined with artificial intelligence for dataset creation. The goal was to map Chinese restaurants in Antananarivo. The system relies on a complex n8n workflow orchestrating automated scraping of data and photos via third-party APIs. The data pipeline integrates a critical validation phase: Python scripts ensure cleaning and structuring of metadata, while a YOLO computer vision model, executed on Google Colab, automatically analyzes and sorts collected images to keep only those relevant to restoration, eliminating visual noise.

atc.description: First-year (L1) educational project developed out of passion for aviation and system programming, this C/SDL2 simulator aims to automate critical tasks of air traffic controllers at Ivato International Airport in Tananarive. The system intelligently manages parking allocation in real-time, monitors airport maximum capacity, calculates emergency trajectories to other airports if necessary, and automatically schedules arrival/departure times. The interface offers an immersive satellite view allowing real-time visualization of aerial movements and ground operations. Developed entirely in C with the SDL2 graphics library, this L1 year-end project demonstrates early understanding of critical systems and planning algorithms, while reflecting a deep passion for the aeronautical field.
